item.title: Vanya add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "At eighteen our convictions are hills from which we look; at forty-five they are caves in which we hide." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Vanya add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "You can't measure the mutual affection of two human beings by the number of words they exchange." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Vanya add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "It never got weird enough for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Vanya add a quote by Richard Brautigan
item.description: "Finding is losing something else. I think about, perhaps even mourn, what I lost to find this" -- Richard Brautigan

item.title: Vanya add a quote by Richard Brautigan
item.description: "Sometimes life is merely a matter of coffee and whatever intimacy a cup of coffee affords." -- Richard Brautigan

item.title: Vanya add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Perhaps the same bird echoed through both of us yesterday, seperate, in the evening." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Vanya add a quote by Richard Leigh
item.description: "You’ve got to sing like you don’t need the money, Love like you’ll never get hurt. You’ve got to dance like nobody’s watchin’." -- Richard Leigh

item.title: Vanya add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Vanya add a quote by bell hooks
Vanya add a quote by bell hooks
item.description: "The transformative power of love is not fully embraced in our society because we often wrongly believe that torment and anguish are our ‘natural’ condition." -- bell hooks

item.title: Vanya add a quote by bell hooks
item.description: "I will not have my life narrowed down. I will not bow down to somebody else's whim or to someone else's ignorance." -- bell hooks
